casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Edwards Dean BELTON. No. 542P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Edward Dean Belton, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th day of October 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of December 2004."
